DOC.brief_title: Corneal Sensation Incidence Dry Eye Post Refractive Cataract Extraction With FemtoSecond Laser
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 year old , good general health Prior sign Institutional Review Board approve Informed Consent Form / Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act subject read gain understanding content Subject schedule cataract extraction intraocular lens require two ( 2 ) femtosecond arcuate relax incision correction corneal astigmatism Subject great equal 1.0 D less equal 2.5 Diopters corneal astigmatism measure keratometry corneal topography Two ( 2 ) arcuate incision 45° length 180° apart . All arcuate relaxing incision place exactly 4.5 mm visual axis 9 mm optical zone . History ophthalmic herpes simplex zoster keratitis OSDI score > 32 Active ocular allergy History refractive surgery surgery involve conjunctival , arcuate corneal incision Contact lens wear study .
